      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Pixel pixel1)
        compares pixels by x,y values. first compares Y and if equal then X
        Parameters:
        pixel1 -
        Returns:
        -1 if this.Int2 < pixel1.Int2, 1 if this.Int2 > pixel1.Int2, else 0
